text: Yoram Koren from the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, Ann Arbor, MI was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for contributions to flexible automation and manufacturing systems. ==Education== *D.Sc., Mechanical Engineering, Technion-Israel Institute of Technology, 1971 *M.Sc., Electrical Engineering, Technion-Israel Institute of Technology, 1968 *B.Sc., Electrical Engineering, Technion-Israel Institute of Technology, 1965 == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Technion – Israel Institute of Technology alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category: University of Michigan faculty
title: Yoram Koren
